intro: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.
description:
Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. The protagonist inherits from his grandfather a magical sundial with which he can travel through time and will find himself involved in different adventures, which will take place in the different capitals of the world. 

Traveling through different historical eras, the protagonist will discover the different monuments of the world and will do everything possible to protect them. The different characters that he will meet will make him learn about art history and Bimfli will be forced to solve great enigmas in his different adventures. 

In this chapter Bimfli will travel to Rome where he must help solve different architectural and artistic challenges. The protagonist will perform different feats to guarantee the preservation of some of the most important monuments and works of art in the world.

·Easy-play mode designed for kids.

·Delightful children's tales for an easy read. 

·Learn to read with fun stories in English. 

·Joyful ambient music and sounds based in the culture of each country. 

·Learn about monuments, cities, civilizations, geography and architecture. 

·Educational content about the history of art with the recreation of the best painters and architects. 

·Learn from the main capital cities as they were in ancient times. 

·Adjust accessibility settings such as font height, sound volume and image transition speed. 

·Embrace diversity and multicultural traditions by exploring the world with Bimfli.
